when i did this from bebadi’s tut ( im on allstar-scape )

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

[code]Ok his is my first tutorial, so please be nice. K here it goes

Difficulty: 1/10

Knowledge: How to use ctrl+f,

Files Modifyed: client.java

This TuT is to tell you how to make it when you die you don’t lose your items, in a certain area.

If you use this please comment or i might remove it.

Ok open client.java and search, public boolean nonwild, and you should see something like this…

Code:
public boolean nonWild() {
if((absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####) ||
heightLevel == 1)
return true;
else
return false;
}Right below that code add this…

Code:
public boolean funZone() { //Code made by babidi28
if((absX >=#### && absX <=#### && absY >=#### && absY <=####) || heightLevel == 1)
return true;
else
return false;
}Fill in the “####” with the coordinates you want your fun zone to be at.

ok now search this… // If killed apply dead, and you should see this…
Code:
if (IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1 && duelStatus != 3) {
ApplyDead();
}
//If killed in duel arena apply dead
if (IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1 && duelStatus == 3) {
ApplyDeadDuel();
}
//update correct hp in stat screen
if (NewHP < 136) {
playerLevel[playerHitpoints] = NewHP;
setSkillLevel(playerHitpoints, NewHP, playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
NewHP = playerLevel[3];
} replace that code with this…

Code:
if((funZone()) && IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1) { //Made by babidi28
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]),
playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
teleportToX = 3253;
teleportToY = 9365;
sendMessage(“You have been killed.”);
ResetAttack();
ResetAttackNPC();
}
else if((funZone()) && IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1) { //Made by babidi28
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]),
playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
teleportToX = 3253;
teleportToY = 9365;
teleblock = false;
sendMessage(“You have been killed.”);
ResetAttack();
ResetAttackNPC();
}
else if((funZone()) && IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1) { //Made by babidi28
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]),
playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
teleportToX = 3253;
teleportToY = 9365;
teleblock = false;
sendMessage(“You have been killed.”);
ResetAttack();
ResetAttackNPC();
}
//If killed apply dead
if (IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1) {
ApplyDead();
}
//update correct hp in stat screen
if (NewHP < 136) {
playerLevel[playerHitpoints] = NewHP;
setSkillLevel(playerHitpoints, NewHP, playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
NewHP = playerLevel[3];
}

(("“You have to logout and log back in to move if you use the code above if you want to be teled away at 1 hp and be able to move use this code.”"))

Code:
if((funZone()) && actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == false && NewHP <= 1) { //Made by babidi28
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
